plot: A lawyer, man of God, commences a friendship with a drug-addict trainer, putting at risk his life and heart. God says 'we are meant to give', but how much really?
title: The Thief of Faith
plot_es: A lawyer, man of God, commences a friendship with a drug-addict trainer, putting at risk his life and heart. God says 'we are meant to give', but how much really?
plot_en: A lawyer, man of God, commences a friendship with a drug-addict trainer, putting at risk his life and heart. God says 'we are meant to give', but how much really?
